verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗ית <S%H7637><s%> And it came to pass in the seventh בַּֽחֲמִשִׁי֙ <S%H2549><s%> in the fifth בֶּעָשׂ֣וֹר <S%H6218><s%> [month] the tenth לַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month בָּ֧אוּ <S%H935><s%> came אֲנָשִׁ֛ים <S%H582><s%> [that] certain מִזִּקְנֵ֥י <S%H2205><s%> of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לִדְרֹ֣שׁ <S%H1875><s%> to enquire אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> and sat לְפָנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> before ס
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Then came the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man דַּבֵּ֞ר <S%H1696><s%> speak אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זִקְנֵ֤י <S%H2205><s%> unto the elders יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD הֲלִדְרֹ֥שׁ <S%H1875><s%> to enquire אֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you בָּאִ֑ים <S%H935><s%> Are ye come חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> of me? [As] I live אָ֙נִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo אִדָּרֵ֣שׁ <S%H1875><s%> I will not be enquired לָכֶ֔ם נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> GOD

הֲתִשְׁפֹּ֣ט <S%H8199><s%> Wilt thou judge אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> הֲתִשְׁפּ֖וֹט <S%H8199><s%> wilt thou judge בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> them son אָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> of man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תּוֹעֲבֹ֥ת <S%H8441><s%> the abominations אֲבוֹתָ֖ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers הוֹדִיעֵֽם׃ <S%H3045><s%> [them]? cause them to know

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> And say אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> to כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3069><s%> GOD בְּיוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> In the day בָּחֳרִ֣י <S%H977><s%> when I chose בְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וָאֶשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> and lifted up יָדִ֗י <S%H3027><s%> mine hand לְזֶ֙רַע֙ <S%H2233><s%> unto the seed בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob וָאִוָּדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> and made myself known לָהֶ֖ם בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto them in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וָאֶשָּׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> when I lifted יָדִ֤י <S%H3027><s%> up mine hand לָהֶם֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> unto them saying אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In the day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> which נָשָׂ֤אתִי <S%H5375><s%> [that] I lifted up יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> mine hand לָהֶ֔ם לְהֽוֹצִיאָ֖ם <S%H3318><s%> unto them to bring them forth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into אֶ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into a land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> i תַּ֣רְתִּי <S%H8446><s%> that I had espied לָהֶ֗ם זָבַ֤ת <S%H2100><s%> for them flowing חָלָב֙ <S%H2461><s%> with milk וּדְבַ֔שׁ <S%H1706><s%> and honey צְבִ֥י <S%H6643><s%> which [is] the glory הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> which לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <S%H776><s%> of all lands

וָאֹמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> about אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man שִׁקּוּצֵ֤י <S%H8251><s%> the abominations עֵינָיו֙ <S%H5869><s%> of his eyes הַשְׁלִ֔יכוּ <S%H7993><s%> I unto them Cast ye away וּבְגִלּוּלֵ֥י <S%H1544><s%> not yourselves with the idols מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּטַּמָּ֑אוּ <S%H2930><s%> and defile אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

וַיַּמְרוּ־ <S%H4784><s%> But they rebelled בִ֗י וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor אָבוּ֙ <S%H14><s%> against me and would לִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> not hearken אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> unto אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto me they did not every man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שִׁקּוּצֵ֤י <S%H8251><s%> the abominations עֵֽינֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5869><s%> of their eyes לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor הִשְׁלִ֔יכוּ <S%H7993><s%> cast away וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גִּלּוּלֵ֥י <S%H1544><s%> the idols מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor עָזָ֑בוּ <S%H5800><s%> neither did they forsake וָאֹמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> then I said לִשְׁפֹּ֧ךְ <S%H8210><s%> I will pour out חֲמָתִ֣י <S%H2534><s%> my fury עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> on לְכַלּ֤וֹת <S%H3615><s%> upon them to accomplish אַפִּי֙ <S%H639><s%> my anger בָּהֶ֔ם בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> against them in the midst אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וָאַ֙עַשׂ֙ <S%H6213><s%> But I wrought לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> the sake שְׁמִ֔י <S%H8034><s%> for my name's לְבִלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> that it הֵחֵ֛ל <S%H2490><s%> sake that it should not be polluted לְעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> before הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> the heathen אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like בְתוֹכָ֑ם <S%H8432><s%> among אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whose נוֹדַ֤עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> I made myself known אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> about לְעֵ֣ינֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> whom they [were] in whose sight לְהוֹצִיאָ֖ם <S%H3318><s%> unto them in bringing them forth מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וָאֽוֹצִיאֵ֖ם <S%H3318><s%> Wherefore I caused them to go forth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וָאֲבִאֵ֖ם <S%H935><s%> and brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> them into the wilderness

וָאֶתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> And I gave לָהֶם֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֻקּוֹתַ֔י <S%H2708><s%> them my statutes וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁפָּטַ֖י <S%H4941><s%> them my judgments הוֹדַ֣עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> and shewed אוֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> do אוֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> הָאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> which [if] a man וָחַ֥י <S%H2425><s%> he shall even live בָּהֶֽם׃

וְגַ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> Also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁבְּתוֹתַי֙ <S%H7676><s%> them my sabbaths נָתַ֣תִּי <S%H5414><s%> Moreover also I gave לָהֶ֔ם לִהְי֣וֹת <S%H1961><s%> to be a לְא֔וֹת <S%H226><s%> to be a sign בֵּינִ֖י <S%H996><s%> between וּבֵֽינֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H996><s%> between לָדַ֕עַת <S%H3045><s%> between me and them that they might know כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD מְקַדְּשָֽׁם׃ <S%H6942><s%> that sanctify

וַיַּמְרוּ־ <S%H4784><s%> rebelled בִ֨י בֵֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> But the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בַּמִּדְבָּ֗ר <S%H4057><s%> against me in the wilderness בְּחֻקּוֹתַ֨י <S%H2708><s%> not in my statutes לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not הָלָ֜כוּ <S%H1980><s%> they walked וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁפָּטַ֣י <S%H4941><s%> my judgments מָאָ֗סוּ <S%H3988><s%> and they despised אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which יַעֲשֶׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> do אֹתָ֤ם <S%H853><s%> הָֽאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> which [if] a man וָחַ֣י <S%H2425><s%> he shall even live בָּהֶ֔ם וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁבְּתֹתַ֖י <S%H7676><s%> in them and my sabbaths חִלְּל֣וּ <S%H2490><s%> polluted מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> they greatly וָאֹמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> then I said לִשְׁפֹּ֨ךְ <S%H8210><s%> I would pour out חֲמָתִ֧י <S%H2534><s%> my fury עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> on בַּמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> upon them in the wilderness לְכַלּוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H3615><s%> to consume

וָאֶעֱשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> But I wrought לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> the sake שְׁמִ֑י <S%H8034><s%> for my name's לְבִלְתִּ֤י <S%H1115><s%> that it הֵחֵל֙ <S%H2490><s%> sake that it should not be polluted לְעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> before הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> the heathen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whose הוֹצֵאתִ֖ים <S%H3318><s%> I brought them out לְעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5869><s%> in whose sight

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> Also אֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I נָשָׂ֧אתִי <S%H5375><s%> Yet also I lifted up יָדִ֛י <S%H3027><s%> my hand לָהֶ֖ם בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> unto them in the wilderness לְבִלְתִּי֩ <S%H1115><s%> not הָבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> that I would not bring אוֹתָ֜ם <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> them into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֗תִּי <S%H5414><s%> which I had given זָבַ֤ת <S%H2100><s%> [them] flowing חָלָב֙ <S%H2461><s%> with milk וּדְבַ֔שׁ <S%H1706><s%> and honey צְבִ֥י <S%H6643><s%> which [is] the glory הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> which לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <S%H776><s%> of all lands

יַ֜עַן <S%H3282><s%> because בְּמִשְׁפָּטַ֣י <S%H4941><s%> my judgments מָאָ֗סוּ <S%H3988><s%> Because they despised וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֻקּוֹתַי֙ <S%H2708><s%> not in my statutes לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not הָלְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> and walked בָהֶ֔ם וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁבְּתוֹתַ֖י <S%H7676><s%> my sabbaths חִלֵּ֑לוּ <S%H2490><s%> but polluted כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> after גִלּוּלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1544><s%> their idols לִבָּ֥ם <S%H3820><s%> for their heart הֹלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> went

וַתָּ֧חָס <S%H2347><s%> spared עֵינִ֛י <S%H5869><s%> Nevertheless mine eye עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and מִֽשַּׁחֲתָ֑ם <S%H7843><s%> them from destroying וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not עָשִׂ֧יתִי <S%H6213><s%> them neither did I make אוֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> כָּלָ֖ה <S%H3617><s%> an end בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> of them in the wilderness

וָאֹמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> But I said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1121><s%> unto their children בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness בְּחוּקֵּ֤י <S%H2706><s%> ye not in the statutes אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1><s%> of your fathers אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּלֵ֔כוּ <S%H1980><s%> walk וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁפְּטֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4941><s%> their judgments אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׁמֹ֑רוּ <S%H8104><s%> neither observe וּבְגִלּוּלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1544><s%> yourselves with their idols אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּטַּמָּֽאוּ׃ <S%H2930><s%> nor defile

אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God בְּחֻקּוֹתַ֖י <S%H2708><s%> in my statutes לֵ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> walk וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁפָּטַ֥י <S%H4941><s%> my judgments שִׁמְר֖וּ <S%H8104><s%> and keep וַעֲשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> and do אוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁבְּתוֹתַ֖י <S%H7676><s%> my sabbaths קַדֵּ֑שׁוּ <S%H6942><s%> And hallow וְהָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> shall be a לְאוֹת֙ <S%H226><s%> and they shall be a sign בֵּינִ֣י <S%H996><s%> between וּבֵֽינֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H996><s%> between לָדַ֕עַת <S%H3045><s%> between me and you that ye may know כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

וַיַּמְרוּ־ <S%H4784><s%> rebelled בִ֣י הַבָּנִ֗ים <S%H1121><s%> Notwithstanding the children בְּחֻקּוֹתַ֣י <S%H2708><s%> not in my statutes לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor הָ֠לָכוּ <S%H1980><s%> against me they walked וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁפָּטַ֨י <S%H4941><s%> my judgments לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor שָׁמְר֜וּ <S%H8104><s%> neither kept לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do אוֹתָ֗ם <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which יַעֲשֶׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> do אוֹתָ֤ם <S%H853><s%> הָֽאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> them which [if] a man וָחַ֣י <S%H2425><s%> he shall even live בָּהֶ֔ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁבְּתוֹתַ֖י <S%H7676><s%> my sabbaths חִלֵּ֑לוּ <S%H2490><s%> in them they polluted וָאֹמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> then I said לִשְׁפֹּ֧ךְ <S%H8210><s%> I would pour out חֲמָתִ֣י <S%H2534><s%> my fury עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> on לְכַלּ֥וֹת <S%H3615><s%> upon them to accomplish אַפִּ֛י <S%H639><s%> my anger בָּ֖ם בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> against them in the wilderness

וַהֲשִׁבֹ֙תִי֙ <S%H7725><s%> Nevertheless I withdrew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדִ֔י <S%H3027><s%> mine hand וָאַ֖עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and wrought לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> the sake שְׁמִ֑י <S%H8034><s%> for my name's לְבִלְתִּ֤י <S%H1115><s%> that it הֵחֵל֙ <S%H2490><s%> sake that it should not be polluted לְעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whose הוֹצֵ֥אתִי <S%H3318><s%> I brought them forth אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> לְעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5869><s%> in whose sight

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Also אֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I נָשָׂ֧אתִי <S%H5375><s%> I lifted up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדִ֛י <S%H3027><s%> mine hand לָהֶ֖ם בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> unto them also in the wilderness לְהָפִ֤יץ <S%H6327><s%> that I would scatter אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> them among the heathen וּלְזָר֥וֹת <S%H2219><s%> and disperse אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בָּאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <S%H776><s%> them through the countries

יַ֜עַן <S%H3282><s%> because מִשְׁפָּטַ֤י <S%H4941><s%> my judgments לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> had not עָשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> Because they had not executed וְחֻקּוֹתַ֣י <S%H2708><s%> my statutes מָאָ֔סוּ <S%H3988><s%> but had despised וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁבְּתוֹתַ֖י <S%H7676><s%> my sabbaths חִלֵּ֑לוּ <S%H2490><s%> and had polluted וְאַחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> were after גִּלּוּלֵ֣י <S%H1544><s%> idols אֲבוֹתָ֔ם <S%H1><s%> their fathers' הָי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5869><s%> and their eyes

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I נָתַ֣תִּי <S%H5414><s%> Wherefore I gave לָהֶ֔ם חֻקִּ֖ים <S%H2706><s%> them also statutes לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> were not טוֹבִ֑ים <S%H2896><s%> [that were] not good וּמִ֨שְׁפָּטִ֔ים <S%H4941><s%> and judgments לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִֽחְי֖וּ <S%H2421><s%> whereby they should not live בָּהֶֽם׃

וָאֲטַמֵּ֤א <S%H2930><s%> And I polluted אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> בְּמַתְּנוֹתָ֔ם <S%H4979><s%> them in their own gifts בְּהַעֲבִ֖יר <S%H5674><s%> in that they caused to pass through כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all פֶּ֣טֶר <S%H6363><s%> [the fire] all that openeth רָ֑חַם <S%H7356><s%> the womb לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> so אֲשִׁמֵּ֔ם <S%H8074><s%> that I might make them desolate לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> order אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> they יֵֽדְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> to the end that they might know אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD ס

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore דַּבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Therefore son אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of man וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD ע֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> Yet זֹ֚את <S%H2063><s%> likewise גִּדְּפ֤וּ <S%H1442><s%> have blasphemed אוֹתִי֙ <S%H853><s%> אֲב֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> Yet in this your fathers בְּמַעֲלָ֥ם <S%H4604><s%> a trespass בִּ֖י מָֽעַל׃ <S%H4603><s%> me in that they have committed

וָאֲבִיאֵם֙ <S%H935><s%> [For] when I had brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> them into the land אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which נָשָׂ֙אתִי֙ <S%H5375><s%> [for] the which I lifted up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדִ֔י <S%H3027><s%> mine hand לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> to give אוֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> לָהֶ֑ם וַיִּרְאוּ֩ <S%H7200><s%> it to them then they saw כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every גִּבְעָ֨ה <S%H1389><s%> hill רָמָ֜ה <S%H7311><s%> every high וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every עֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> trees עָבֹ֗ת <S%H5687><s%> and all the thick וַיִּזְבְּחוּ־ <S%H2076><s%> and they offered שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זִבְחֵיהֶם֙ <S%H2077><s%> there their sacrifices וַיִּתְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> and there they presented שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> and there כַּ֣עַס <S%H3708><s%> the provocation קָרְבָּנָ֔ם <S%H7133><s%> of their offering וַיָּשִׂ֣ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> there also they made שָׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> There רֵ֚יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיח֣וֹחֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5207><s%> their sweet וַיַּסִּ֥יכוּ <S%H5258><s%> and poured out שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> and there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נִסְכֵּיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5262><s%> there their drink offerings

וָאֹמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Then I said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> What הַבָּמָ֔ה <S%H1116><s%> unto them What [is] the high place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> to which אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> ye הַבָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> whereunto ye go שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> in it וַיִּקָּרֵ֤א <S%H7121><s%> thereof is called שְׁמָהּ֙ <S%H8034><s%> ? And the name בָּמָ֔ה <S%H1117><s%> Bamah עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> this הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore אֱמֹ֣ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> Wherefore say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הַבְּדֶ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> after the manner אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> of your fathers אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> will you נִטְמְאִ֑ים <S%H2930><s%> Are ye polluted וְאַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> after שִׁקּוּצֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H8251><s%> their detestable אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> you זֹנִֽים׃ <S%H2181><s%> and play

וּבִשְׂאֵ֣ת <S%H5375><s%> For when ye offer מַתְּנֹֽתֵיכֶ֡ם <S%H4979><s%> your gifts בְּֽהַעֲבִיר֩ <S%H5674><s%> to pass through בְּנֵיכֶ֨ם <S%H1121><s%> when ye make your sons בָּאֵ֜שׁ <S%H784><s%> the fire אַתֶּם֩ <S%H859><s%> you נִטְמְאִ֤֨ים <S%H2930><s%> ye pollute לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גִּלּֽוּלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1544><s%> yourselves with all your idols עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> to this הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> even unto this day וַאֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> and shall I אִדָּרֵ֥שׁ <S%H1875><s%> and shall I be enquired לָכֶ֖ם בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of by you O house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> age אָ֗נִי <S%H589><s%> I נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo אִדָּרֵ֖שׁ <S%H1875><s%> I will not be enquired לָכֶֽם׃

וְהָֽעֹלָה֙ <S%H5927><s%> And that which cometh עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> into ר֣וּחֲכֶ֔ם <S%H7307><s%> into your mind הָי֖וֹ <S%H1961><s%> We will be לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will not תִֽהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> come אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <S%H834><s%> when אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you אֹמְרִ֗ים <S%H559><s%> shall not be at all that ye say נִֽהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> come כַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> as the heathen כְּמִשְׁפְּח֣וֹת <S%H4940><s%> as the families הָאֲרָצ֔וֹת <S%H776><s%> of the countries לְשָׁרֵ֖ת <S%H8334><s%> to serve עֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> wood וָאָֽבֶן׃ <S%H68><s%> and stone

חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> [As] I live אָ֕נִי <S%H589><s%> I נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֠א <S%H3808><s%> not בְּיָ֨ד <S%H3027><s%> hand חֲזָקָ֜ה <S%H2389><s%> surely with a mighty וּבִזְר֧וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> arm נְטוּיָ֛ה <S%H5186><s%> and with a stretched out וּבְחֵמָ֥ה <S%H2534><s%> and with fury שְׁפוּכָ֖ה <S%H8210><s%> poured out אֶמְל֥וֹךְ <S%H4427><s%> will I rule עֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> over

וְהוֹצֵאתִ֤י <S%H3318><s%> And I will bring you out אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> from the people וְקִבַּצְתִּ֣י <S%H6908><s%> and will gather אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָ֣אֲרָצ֔וֹת <S%H776><s%> you out of the countries אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> where נְפוֹצֹתֶ֖ם <S%H6327><s%> wherein ye are scattered בָּ֑ם בְּיָ֤ד <S%H3027><s%> hand חֲזָקָה֙ <S%H2389><s%> with a mighty וּבִזְר֣וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> arm נְטוּיָ֔ה <S%H5186><s%> and with a stretched out וּבְחֵמָ֖ה <S%H2534><s%> and with fury שְׁפוּכָֽה׃ <S%H8210><s%> poured out

וְהֵבֵאתִ֣י <S%H935><s%> And I will bring אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into מִדְבַּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> you into the wilderness הָֽעַמִּ֑ים <S%H5971><s%> of the people וְנִשְׁפַּטְתִּ֤י <S%H8199><s%> and there will I plead אִתְּכֶם֙ <S%H854><s%> for שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> and there פָּנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> with you face אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פָּנִֽים׃ <S%H6440><s%> to face

כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> I נִשְׁפַּ֙טְתִּי֙ <S%H8199><s%> Like as I pleaded אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אֲב֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> with your fathers בְּמִדְבַּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt כֵּ֚ן <S%H3651><s%> so אִשָּׁפֵ֣ט <S%H8199><s%> so will I plead אִתְּכֶ֔ם <S%H854><s%> for נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> with you saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD

וְהַעֲבַרְתִּ֥י <S%H5674><s%> And I will cause you to pass אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּׁ֑בֶט <S%H7626><s%> under the rod וְהֵבֵאתִ֥י <S%H935><s%> and I will bring אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בְּמָסֹ֥רֶת <S%H4562><s%> you into the bond הַבְּרִֽית׃ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant

וּבָרוֹתִ֣י <S%H1305><s%> And I will purge out מִכֶּ֗ם <S%H4480><s%> at הַמֹּרְדִ֤ים <S%H4775><s%> from among you the rebels וְהַפּֽוֹשְׁעִים֙ <S%H6586><s%> and them that transgress בִּ֔י מֵאֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the country מְגֽוּרֵיהֶם֙ <S%H4033><s%> where they sojourn אוֹצִ֣יא <S%H3318><s%> against me I will bring them forth אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אַדְמַ֥ת <S%H127><s%> into the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> they will not יָב֑וֹא <S%H935><s%> and they shall not enter וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> and ye shall know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD

וְאַתֶּ֨ם <S%H859><s%> O בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> As for you O house יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהֹוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ye every one גִּלּוּלָיו֙ <S%H1544><s%> his idols לְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> Go עֲבֹ֔דוּ <S%H5647><s%> ye serve וְאַחַ֕ר <S%H310><s%> and hereafter אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo אֵינְכֶ֖ם <S%H369><s%> else שֹׁמְעִ֣ים <S%H8085><s%> [also] if ye will not hearken אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> about וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֤ם <S%H8034><s%> name קָדְשִׁי֙ <S%H6944><s%> ye my holy לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no תְחַלְּלוּ־ <S%H2490><s%> unto me but pollute ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer בְּמַתְּנֽוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H4979><s%> no more with your gifts וּבְגִלּוּלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1544><s%> and with your idols

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for בְהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> mountain קָדְשִׁ֞י <S%H6944><s%> For in mine holy בְּהַ֣ר ׀ <S%H2022><s%> in the mountain מְר֣וֹם <S%H4791><s%> of the height יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> there יַעַבְדֻ֜נִי <S%H5647><s%> serve כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole בֵּ֧ית <S%H1004><s%> there shall all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כֻּלֹּ֖ה <S%H3605><s%> all בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> all of them in the land שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֶרְצֵ֔ם <S%H7521><s%> me there will I accept וְשָׁ֞ם <S%H8033><s%> and there אֶדְר֣וֹשׁ <S%H1875><s%> them and there will I require אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּרוּמֹֽתֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H8641><s%> your offerings וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֵאשִׁ֛ית <S%H7225><s%> and the firstfruits מַשְׂאוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H4864><s%> of your oblations בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all קָדְשֵׁיכֶֽם׃ <S%H6944><s%> with all your holy things

בְּרֵ֣יחַ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹחַ֮ <S%H5207><s%> you with your sweet אֶרְצֶ֣ה <S%H7521><s%> I will accept אֶתְכֶם֒ <S%H853><s%> בְּהוֹצִיאִ֤י <S%H3318><s%> when I bring you out אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> from the people וְקִבַּצְתִּ֣י <S%H6908><s%> and gather אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָ֣אֲרָצ֔וֹת <S%H776><s%> you out of the countries אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> where נְפֹצֹתֶ֖ם <S%H6327><s%> wherein ye have been scattered בָּ֑ם וְנִקְדַּשְׁתִּ֥י <S%H6942><s%> and I will be sanctified בָכֶ֖ם לְעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in you before הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> the heathen

וִֽידַעְתֶּם֙ <S%H3045><s%> And ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD בַּהֲבִיאִ֥י <S%H935><s%> when I shall bring אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into אַדְמַ֣ת <S%H127><s%> you into the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the country אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which נָשָׂ֙אתִי֙ <S%H5375><s%> [for] the which I lifted up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדִ֔י <S%H3027><s%> mine hand לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> to give אוֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> לַאֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> it to your fathers

וּזְכַרְתֶּם־ <S%H2142><s%> And there shall ye remember שָׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> There אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דַּרְכֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1870><s%> your ways וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עֲלִיל֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5949><s%> and all your doings אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נִטְמֵאתֶ֖ם <S%H2930><s%> wherein ye have been defiled בָּ֑ם וּנְקֹֽטֹתֶם֙ <S%H6962><s%> and ye shall lothe בִּפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> yourselves in your own sight בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all רָעוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H7451><s%> for all your evils אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עֲשִׂיתֶֽם׃ <S%H6213><s%> that ye have committed

וִֽידַעְתֶּם֙ <S%H3045><s%> And ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD בַּעֲשׂוֹתִ֥י <S%H6213><s%> when I have wrought אִתְּכֶ֖ם <S%H854><s%> for לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> sake שְׁמִ֑י <S%H8034><s%> with you for my name's לֹא֩ <S%H3808><s%> not כְדַרְכֵיכֶ֨ם <S%H1870><s%> ways הָרָעִ֜ים <S%H7451><s%> sake not according to your wicked וְכַעֲלִילֽוֹתֵיכֶ֤ם <S%H5949><s%> doings הַנִּשְׁחָתוֹת֙ <S%H7843><s%> nor according to your corrupt בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> O ye house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> GOD פ
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man שִׂ֤ים <S%H7760><s%> set פָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6440><s%> thy face דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> toward תֵּימָ֔נָה <S%H8486><s%> the south וְהַטֵּ֖ף <S%H5197><s%> and drop אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against דָּר֑וֹם <S%H1864><s%> [thy word] toward the south וְהִנָּבֵ֛א <S%H5012><s%> and prophesy אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against יַ֥עַר <S%H3293><s%> against the forest הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> field נֶֽגֶב׃ <S%H5045><s%> of the south

וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <S%H559><s%> And say לְיַ֣עַר <S%H3293><s%> to the forest הַנֶּ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> of the south שְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> Hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֡ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> I am about מַֽצִּית־ <S%H3341><s%> Behold I will kindle בְּךָ֣ ׀ אֵ֡שׁ <S%H784><s%> a fire וְאָכְלָ֣ה <S%H398><s%> in thee and it shall devour בְךָ֣ כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every עֵֽץ־ <S%H6086><s%> tree לַח֩ <S%H3892><s%> every green וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every עֵ֨ץ <S%H6086><s%> tree יָבֵ֤שׁ <S%H3002><s%> in thee and every dry לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תִכְבֶּה֙ <S%H3518><s%> shall not be quenched לַהֶ֣בֶת <S%H3852><s%> the flaming שַׁלְהֶ֔בֶת <S%H7957><s%> flame וְנִצְרְבוּ־ <S%H6866><s%> shall be burned בָ֥הּ כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and the whole פָּנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> and all faces מִנֶּ֥גֶב <S%H5045><s%> from the south צָפֽוֹנָה׃ <S%H6828><s%> to the north

וְרָאוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> shall see כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All בָּשָׂ֔ר <S%H1320><s%> And all flesh כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that I the LORD בִּֽעַרְתִּ֑יהָ <S%H1197><s%> have kindled לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> not תִּכְבֶּֽה׃ <S%H3518><s%> it it shall not be quenched

וָאֹמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֲהָ֖הּ <S%H162><s%> I Ah אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הֵ֚מָּה <S%H1992><s%> They אֹמְרִ֣ים <S%H559><s%> they say לִ֔י הֲלֹ֛א <S%H3808><s%> is he מְמַשֵּׁ֥ל <S%H4911><s%> of me Doth he not speak מְשָׁלִ֖ים <S%H4912><s%> byword הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he פ
